70.7 %.from sentence: The best performance obtained is 70.7 % while using word - 1 , 2 - grams and POS - 1 , 2 , 3 - grams as features .

character - 3 , 4 grams.from sentence: Although character - 3 , 4 grams gave improvement over word unigrams and bigrams , the performance did not sustain when combined with POS tags .

POS n-grams.from sentence: Using POS n-grams gave a strong boost of 5.2 points over word unigrams and bigrams .
